long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NightModer extension helps to experience any website in the night mode. This is the first version of extension and personally my first chrome extension in production.
Constructive feedback is appreciated @ suhail.khan.ftg@gmail.com
